paragraphs.content: The First Book of the Chronicles
paragraphs.contentHtml: <small>The First Book of the</small> Chronicles

paragraphs.content: Chapter 1
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 1

paragraphs.content: Adam, Sheth, Enosh,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Adam, Sheth, Enosh,

paragraphs.content: Kenan, Mahalaleel, Jered,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Kenan, Mahalaleel, Jered,

paragraphs.content: Henoch, Methuselah, Lamech,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Henoch, Methuselah, Lamech,

paragraphs.content: Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.

paragraphs.content: ¶ The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.

paragraphs.content: And the sons of Gomer; Ashchenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the sons of Gomer; Ashchenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.

paragraphs.content: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.

paragraphs.content: ¶ The sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ The sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.

paragraphs.content: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raamah, and Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raamah, and Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.

paragraphs.content: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be mighty upon the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be mighty upon the earth.

paragraphs.content: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,

paragraphs.content: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (of whom came the Philistines,) and Caphthorim.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (of whom came the Philistines,) and Caphthorim.

paragraphs.content: And Canaan begat Zidon his firstborn, and Heth,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Canaan begat Zidon his firstborn, and Heth,

paragraphs.content: The Jebusite also, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Jebusite also, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,

paragraphs.content: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,

paragraphs.content: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.

paragraphs.content: ¶ The sons of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ The sons of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.

paragraphs.content: And Arphaxad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Arphaxad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.

paragraphs.content: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg; because in his days the earth was divided: and his brother’s name was Joktan.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg; because in his days the earth was divided: and his brother’s name was Joktan.

paragraphs.content: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,

paragraphs.content: Hadoram also, and Uzal, and Diklah,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Hadoram also, and Uzal, and Diklah,

paragraphs.content: And Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,

paragraphs.content: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the sons of Joktan.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the sons of Joktan.

paragraphs.content: ¶ Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,

paragraphs.content: Eber, Peleg, Reu,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Eber, Peleg, Reu,

paragraphs.content: Serug, Nahor, Terah,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Serug, Nahor, Terah,

paragraphs.content: Abram; the same is Abraham.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Abram; the same is Abraham.

paragraphs.content: The sons of Abraham; Isaac, and Ishmael.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The sons of Abraham; Isaac, and Ishmael.

paragraphs.content: ¶ These are their generations: The firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ These are their generations: The firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,

paragraphs.content: Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,

paragraphs.content: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.

paragraphs.content: ¶ Now the sons of Keturah, Abraham’s concubine: she bare Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan; Sheba, and Dedan.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Now the sons of Keturah, Abraham’s concubine: she bare Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan; Sheba, and Dedan.

paragraphs.content: And the sons of Midian; Ephah, and Epher, and Henoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these are the sons of Keturah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the sons of Midian; Ephah, and Epher, and Henoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these are the sons of Keturah.

paragraphs.content: And Abraham begat Isaac. The sons of Isaac; Esau and Israel.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Abraham begat Isaac. The sons of Isaac; Esau and Israel.

paragraphs.content: ¶ The sons of Esau; Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ The sons of Esau; Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.

paragraphs.content: The sons of Eliphaz; Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The sons of Eliphaz; Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.

paragraphs.content: The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.

paragraphs.content: And the sons of Seir; Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the sons of Seir; Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.

paragraphs.content: And the sons of Lotan; Hori, and Homam: and Timna was Lotan’s sister.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the sons of Lotan; Hori, and Homam: and Timna was Lotan’s sister.

paragraphs.content: The sons of Shobal; Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon; Aiah, and Anah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The sons of Shobal; Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon; Aiah, and Anah.

paragraphs.content: The sons of Anah; Dishon. And the sons of Dishon; Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The sons of Anah; Dishon. And the sons of Dishon; Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.

paragraphs.content: The sons of Ezer; Bilhan, and Zavan, and Jakan. The sons of Dishan; Uz, and Aran.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The sons of Ezer; Bilhan, and Zavan, and Jakan. The sons of Dishan; Uz, and Aran.

paragraphs.content: ¶ Now these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom before any king reigned over the children of Israel; Bela the son of Beor: and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Now these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom before any king reigned over the children of Israel; Bela the son of Beor: and the name of his city was Dinhabah.

paragraphs.content: And when Bela was dead, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And when Bela was dead, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.

paragraphs.content: And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.

paragraphs.content: And when Husham was dead, Hadad the son of Bedad, which smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Avith.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And when Husham was dead, Hadad the son of Bedad, which smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Avith.

paragraphs.content: And when Hadad was dead, Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And when Hadad was dead, Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.

paragraphs.content: And when Samlah was dead, Shaul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And when Samlah was dead, Shaul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.

paragraphs.content: And when Shaul was dead, Baal-hanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And when Shaul was dead, Baal-hanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.

paragraphs.content: And when Baal-hanan was dead, Hadad reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Pai; and his wife’s name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And when Baal-hanan was dead, Hadad reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Pai; and his wife’s name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.

paragraphs.content: ¶ Hadad died also. And the dukes of Edom were; duke Timnah, duke Aliah, duke Jetheth,
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Hadad died also. And the dukes of Edom were; duke Timnah, duke Aliah, duke Jetheth,

paragraphs.content: Duke Aholibamah, duke Elah, duke Pinon,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Duke Aholibamah, duke Elah, duke Pinon,

paragraphs.content: Duke Kenaz, duke Teman, duke Mibzar,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Duke Kenaz, duke Teman, duke Mibzar,

paragraphs.content: Duke Magdiel, duke Iram. These are the dukes of Edom.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Duke Magdiel, duke Iram. These are the dukes of Edom.
